question: Where do I get my CNA license card? Help please. ?
question_content: I already passed state exams and everything but where do I get my actual card proving I'm a Cna? Or what do I get to prove it so I can start working??

answers.answer_content: Check out www.cnatrainingcertificationclasses.com they have all the certification agencies in each state listed.  Call your state agency and ask that question.  ALso there is a forum cnacommunity.com that could help
